component_text.text: [ph]The following agent will spawn at your faction capital:

callback_with_context.context_function_id: #Hack alert! Targets a settlement but wants to show the garrison#GetIfElse(ritual.RitualContext.Key == "wh3_dlc24_ritual_cth_mos_steel_settlement_generate_temporary_army", settlement.GarrisonForceContext, settlement)

#Hack alert! Targets a settlement but wants to show the garrison as well#DoIf(ritual.RitualContext.Key == "wh3_dlc24_ritual_cth_mos_steel_settlement_generate_temporary_army", Do(self.ChildContext("force_details_container").PropagateContext(settlement.GarrisonForceContext), self.ChildContext("settlement_details_container").PropagateContext(settlement), self.ChildContext("force_details_container").SetVisible(true)))

#Ensures that the current targetting context is set when the panel opens#DoIf(self.CurrentState == "selected" && IsContextValid(TargettingContext) == false, Do(TargettingContext.ClearTarget, RitualInteractionContext.EnableTargetting(TargetType != "SELF")))

#Ensures that the current targetting context is set when the panel opens#DoIf(self.CurrentState == "selected" && IsContextValid(TargettingContext) == false, Do(TargettingContext.ClearTarget, RitualInteractionContext.EnableTargetting(TargetType != "SELF")))

#Ensures that the current targetting context is set when the panel opens#DoIf(self.CurrentState == "selected" && IsContextValid(TargettingContext) == false, Do(TargettingContext.ClearTarget, RitualInteractionContext.EnableTargetting(TargetType != "SELF")))

icon_attrition.componentleveltooltip: This garrison is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition due to being under siege.

icon_loan.componentleveltooltip: Turns until army is returned to {{CcoCampaignMilitaryForce:FactionLoanedFromContext.Name}}

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Format("%s: %d%%", Loc("wall_strength"), Floor(WallsHealthPercent * 100)) + GetIfElse(NumWallBreaches > 0, Format(" %s: %d", Loc("num_breaches"), NumWallBreaches), "")

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

list_box.comment: Fill in the context object and context function in order to populate the available list of options for the dropdown menu

selected_context_display.comment: Just fill in the context object and context function to display what information you want about the selected context from the dropdown. Feel free to also add any other children you want like icons, etc that you want to display related to the selected context!

template_dropdown_entry.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. Also feel free to change ContextCommandLeftClick to an initialiser or whatever else you want to handle when selecting an entry. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc
